by_press_SOS: Pressing and holding the SOS button
emergency_message: will send an emergency message to this phone number, indicating that the patient needs assistance.
whatsapp_message: To use this feature, both the patient's device and their guardian's device must have WhatsApp installed.
country_code_one_digit: The country code must have at least one digit
sos_tap_alert: Holding this button down sends a WhatsApp message to the registered emergency number.
you_must_config: You must set up emergency information before using this feature.
